import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Navbar(_ref){let{onSignOut}=_ref;const[isOpen,setIsOpen]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const toggleSidebar=()=>setIsOpen(!isOpen);const handleLinkClick=path=>{setIsOpen(false);setTimeout(()=>{navigate(path);},300);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar-hamburger",onClick:toggleSidebar,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:WLogo,alt:"Logo",className:"hamburger-icon",style:{marginTop:'5px'}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar-title",style:{fontSize:'1.5rem'},children:"Waite"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar-signout-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"navbar-signout",onClick:onSignOut,children:"Sign Out"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sidebar ".concat(isOpen?'open':''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>handleLinkClick('/home'),children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>handleLinkClick('/leaderboard'),children:"Leaderboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>handleLinkClick('/speech-test'),children:"Speech Test"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>handleLinkClick('/fun-activities'),children:"Fun Activities"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>handleLinkClick('/im-drinking'),children:"I'm Drinking"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>handleLinkClick('/settings'),children:"Settings"})]})}),isOpen&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sidebar-overlay",onClick:toggleSidebar})]});}
